title: Champ teaser?
body: Anyone else notice a weird image/logo show up above their head in some of their games? It looks like a black and white swirly version of a yin & yang symbol and showed up very similar to how the champion mastery emote shows up. If it means anything I was playing Zed when this happened. Anyone know the meaning of this? The last time Riot pulled something like this it was the laughing at blue buff/river and that wound up being the laugh of Tahm Kench. Is this Riot's new hype generating scheme for a new champion?
